content.original: The Arrow IV is a stand-alone, missile based, artillery system, designed to augment conventional systems such as the Long Tom and the Sniper. It was first introduced by the Terran Hegemony in 2600 and became a staple of the Star League Defense Force. Although the technology to create Arrow IVs was lost during the Star League's collapse, it was recovered by Capellan Confederation engineers in 3044 working off of surviving examples and the Helm Memory Core. Uses ArrowIV Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: The Arrow IV is a stand-alone, missile based, artillery system, designed to augment conventional systems such as the Long Tom and the Sniper. It was first introduced by the Terran Hegemony in 2600 and became a staple of the Star League Defense Force. Although the technology to create Arrow IVs was lost during the Star League's collapse, it was recovered by Capellan Confederation engineers in 3044 working off of surviving examples and the Helm Memory Core. Uses ArrowIV Ammo.
content.content: 箭IV是一种独立的、基于导弹的火炮系统,目的是增强长汤姆(Long Tom)和狙击手(Sniper)等常规系统.它最初是在2600年由人类霸权引入,并成为星联防御部队的主要装备.尽管在星联崩溃后箭IV的技术失传,但它在3044年被卡佩兰联邦的工程师们从海姆(Helm)记忆核心中恢复. 使用箭IV弹药.

content.original: The Long Tom Artillery Piece is the largest conventional artillery piece designed by Armstrong Industries. It is the primary weapon of the LT-MOB-25 Mobile Long Tom Artillery vehicle, which is better known as the Mobile Long Tom. Uses LongTom Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: The Long Tom Artillery Piece is the largest conventional artillery piece designed by Armstrong Industries. It is the primary weapon of the LT-MOB-25 Mobile Long Tom Artillery vehicle, which is better known as the Mobile Long Tom. Uses LongTom Ammo.
content.content: 长汤姆(Long Tom)大炮是阿姆斯特朗工业公司设计的最大常规炮弹.它是LT-MOB-25移动长汤姆炮车的主要武器,作为移动长汤姆而被人熟知. 使用长汤姆弹药.

content.original: The Long Tom Artillery Cannon is a scaled down version of the Long Tom Artillery Piece designed for use as an on-board indirect fire weapon. Capable of being mounted on 'Mechs, combat vehicles, and AeroSpace Fighters, the Long Tom Cannon is a snub-nosed version of the artillery piece of the same name. Uses LongTom Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: The Long Tom Artillery Cannon is a scaled down version of the Long Tom Artillery Piece designed for use as an on-board indirect fire weapon. Capable of being mounted on 'Mechs, combat vehicles, and AeroSpace Fighters, the Long Tom Cannon is a snub-nosed version of the artillery piece of the same name. Uses LongTom Ammo.
content.content: 长汤姆加农炮是长汤姆大炮的缩小版,被设计作为机载间接火力武器.长汤姆加农炮可以安装在机甲、作战车辆和航空战斗机上,是同名火炮的短管版本. 使用长汤姆弹药.

content.original: The Sniper Rifle Artillery Piece is the smaller cousin to the Long Tom Artillery Piece designed by Armstrong Industries. As the second most-powerful tube artillery in the Inner Sphere, the Sniper can cripple or destroy most light and medium BattleMechs with a single hit. Uses Sniper Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: The Sniper Rifle Artillery Piece is the smaller cousin to the Long Tom Artillery Piece designed by Armstrong Industries. As the second most-powerful tube artillery in the Inner Sphere, the Sniper can cripple or destroy most light and medium BattleMechs with a single hit. Uses Sniper Ammo.
content.content: 狙击手线膛火炮是阿姆斯特朗工业公司设计的长口径火炮的较小版近亲.作为内天体第二大威力的管状火炮,狙击手可以用一次攻击就摧毁大多数轻型和中型战斗机甲. 使用狙击弹药.

content.original: The Sniper Rifle Artillery Piece is the smaller cousin to the Long Tom Artillery Piece designed by Armstrong Industries. As the second most-powerful tube artillery in the Inner Sphere, the Sniper can cripple or destroy most light and medium BattleMechs with a single hit. Uses Sniper Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: The Sniper Rifle Artillery Piece is the smaller cousin to the Long Tom Artillery Piece designed by Armstrong Industries. As the second most-powerful tube artillery in the Inner Sphere, the Sniper can cripple or destroy most light and medium BattleMechs with a single hit. Uses Sniper Ammo.
content.content: 狙击手线膛火炮是阿姆斯特朗工业公司设计的长口径火炮的较小版近亲.作为内天体第二大威力的管状火炮,狙击手可以用一次攻击就摧毁大多数轻型和中型战斗机甲. 使用狙击弹药.

content.original: The Thumper Artillery Piece is the smallest conventional artillery piece with an effective range of 10.5 kilometers. While an effective Field Artillery weapon, the Thumper is perhaps best known for its use as the main gun on the SLDF's Thor Artillery Vehicle, as well as the Thor's knock-off the Thumper. Uses Thumper Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: The Thumper Artillery Piece is the smallest conventional artillery piece with an effective range of 10.5 kilometers. While an effective Field Artillery weapon, the Thumper is perhaps best known for its use as the main gun on the SLDF's Thor Artillery Vehicle, as well as the Thor's knock-off the Thumper. Uses Thumper Ammo.
content.content: 敲击者(Thumper)火炮是最小的常规火炮,有效射程为10.5公里.虽然是一种有效的野战火炮武器,但敲击者最为人熟知的可能是它作为星联防御部队雷神炮车上的主炮,以及的雷神敲击者的仿制品. 使用敲击者弹药.

content.original: The Thumper Artillery Cannon is a scaled down version of the Thumper Artillery Piece capable of direct fire. When mounted on BattleMechs, combat vehicles, and AeroSpace Fighters, it provides artillery support at much closer ranges than its cousin. Essentially a snub-nosed version of the Thumper Artillery Piece, the Thumper Artillery Cannon fires a shell at an enemy location like an autocannon. Uses Thumper Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: The Thumper Artillery Cannon is a scaled down version of the Thumper Artillery Piece capable of direct fire. When mounted on BattleMechs, combat vehicles, and AeroSpace Fighters, it provides artillery support at much closer ranges than its cousin. Essentially a snub-nosed version of the Thumper Artillery Piece, the Thumper Artillery Cannon fires a shell at an enemy location like an autocannon. Uses Thumper Ammo.
content.content: 敲击者加农炮是敲击者火炮的缩小版,能够直接开火.当安装在战斗机甲、作战车辆和航空战斗机上时,它比同类火炮提供更近距离的炮击支持.本质上,敲击者加农炮是敲击者火的短管版,它像汽车炮一样向敌人发射炮弹. 使用敲击者弹药.

content.original: Yeah Boss, this is a Howitzer with a RAC Feeder, what do you want me to say? This is typical Pirate tech and I don't even want to know what they were taking when they came up with this! Uses Hellstorm Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: Yeah Boss, this is a Howitzer with a RAC Feeder, what do you want me to say? This is typical Pirate tech and I don't even want to know what they were taking when they came up with this! Uses Hellstorm Ammo.
content.content: 是的,老大,这是一门装有RAC馈线的榴弹炮,你想让我说什么?这是典型的海盗技术而且我们甚至不知道他们想做什么! 使用地狱风暴弹药.

content.original: The smallest of the Cruise Missile family developed by the Federated Suns in the 3060s, the CM/50 is nonetheless an utterly devastating weapon of war. The CM/50 is a truly massive missile and its payload is perfectly capable of annihilating smaller 'Mechs in a single shot as well as devastate stationary targets. However, the weapon's immense bulk and absurd ammo weight requirements limited its ability to be fielded and as of now only a single combat unit is capable of fielding the CM/50, the Kalki Cruise Missile Launcher superheavy tank. Uses Cruise Missile/50 Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: The smallest of the Cruise Missile family developed by the Federated Suns in the 3060s, the CM/50 is nonetheless an utterly devastating weapon of war. The CM/50 is a truly massive missile and its payload is perfectly capable of annihilating smaller 'Mechs in a single shot as well as devastate stationary targets. However, the weapon's immense bulk and absurd ammo weight requirements limited its ability to be fielded and as of now only a single combat unit is capable of fielding the CM/50, the Kalki Cruise Missile Launcher superheavy tank. Uses Cruise Missile/50 Ammo.
content.content: CM/50是恒星联邦在3060年代开发的巡航导弹(CM)家族中最小的一种,但它却是一种毁灭性的战争武器.CM/50是一种真正的重型导弹,其战斗部完全可以一击摧毁较小的机甲和固定目标.然而,这种武器巨大的体积和简直荒谬的弹药重量限制了它的大规模装备.到目前为止,只有卡尔基巡航导弹发射器超重型坦装备了CM/50. 使用CM/50弹药.

content.original: The Railgun is a massive weapon adapted from WarShips to be used on BattleMechs. Clan technology has allowed such a massive weapon to fit a relative small space. The powerful weapon decimates enemy 'Mechs with a single, well-placed shot, but only a few 'Mechs can mount. Uses Railgun Ammo. CASE PROTECTED.
content.prevOriginal: The Railgun is a massive weapon adapted from WarShips to be used on BattleMechs. Clan technology has allowed such a massive weapon to fit a relative small space. The powerful weapon decimates enemy 'Mechs with a single, well-placed shot, but only a few 'Mechs can mount. Uses Railgun Ammo. CASE PROTECTED.
content.content: 轨道炮是一种从战舰武器改装而来的大型武器,可用于战斗机甲.氏族技术允许这种大型武器适配相对较小的空间.这种强大的武器只需要一次准确的射击就可以摧毁敌人的机甲,但只有少数机甲可以装备. 使用轨道炮弹药 CASE保护

content.original: The Railgun is a massive weapon adapted from WarShips to be used on BattleMechs. This Original SLDF Era Railgun is heavier and got upgraded capacitors to not explode when destroyed but still is prohibitively heavy and large and can only fit on the largest BattleMechs. Uses Railgun Gauss Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: The Railgun is a massive weapon adapted from WarShips to be used on BattleMechs. This Original SLDF Era Railgun is heavier and got upgraded capacitors to not explode when destroyed but still is prohibitively heavy and large and can only fit on the largest BattleMechs. Uses Railgun Gauss Ammo.
content.content: 轨道炮是一种从战舰武器改装而来的大型武器,可用于战斗机甲.这种原始的星联防卫军时代的轨道炮更重,并配备了升级的电容器,在被摧毁时会爆炸.非常重和大,只能在最大的战斗机甲上安装. 使用轨道炮高斯弹药.

content.original: This TAG is hardwired to nearby Arrow IV Support carriers and calls in a precision strike
content.prevOriginal: This TAG is hardwired to nearby Arrow IV Support carriers and calls in a precision strike
content.content: 目标寻获装备(TAG)接驳到附近的箭IV支持系统,并在精确打击中调用.

content.original: This TAG was rewired to call on supporting Fire from nearby Artillery to Shell the target with a selection of munitions
content.prevOriginal: This TAG was rewired to call on supporting Fire from nearby Artillery to Shell the target with a selection of munitions
content.content: 该目标寻获装备被重新布线,以调用附近火炮的支援火力,用一系列弹药向目标发射炮弹

content.original: Need to remind your Neighbor of the Noise? Chug some Budget over to the Rowdy Town over? Cant Afford a Fancy Long Tom? Look no Further we at Quicsell work hard to bring you finest in Weapons, Our Howitzer 2000 is based on well known Lyran designs coming straight from Terra! Uses Medium Rifle Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: Need to remind your Neighbor of the Noise? Chug some Budget over to the Rowdy Town over? Cant Afford a Fancy Long Tom? Look no Further we at Quicsell work hard to bring you finest in Weapons, Our Howitzer 2000 is based on well known Lyran designs coming straight from Terra! Uses Medium Rifle Ammo.
content.content: 需要提醒你的邻居注意噪音吗?在喧闹的小镇上多花点钱?买不起一个花哨的长汤姆吗?别在看了,我们QuicSell公司为你带来最好的武器,我们的榴弹炮2000直接来自于地球并基于著名的天琴座设计. 使用中型线膛弹药

content.original: The Thumper Artillery Piece is the smallest conventional artillery piece with an effective range of 10.5 kilometers. While an effective Field Artillery weapon, the Thumper is perhaps best known for its use as the main gun on the SLDF's Thor Artillery Vehicle, as well as the Thor's knock-off the Thumper. Uses Thumper Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: The Thumper Artillery Piece is the smallest conventional artillery piece with an effective range of 10.5 kilometers. While an effective Field Artillery weapon, the Thumper is perhaps best known for its use as the main gun on the SLDF's Thor Artillery Vehicle, as well as the Thor's knock-off the Thumper. Uses Thumper Ammo.
content.content: 敲击者(Thumper)火炮是最小的常规火炮,有效射程为10.5公里.虽然是一种有效的野战火炮武器,但敲击者最为人熟知的可能是它作为星联防御部队雷神炮车上的主炮,以及的雷神敲击者的仿制品. 使用敲击者弹药.

content.original: The Thunderstorm is an experiment in using Thunderbolt missiles as artillery. It's unique rack system loads and launches a full ton of any size Thunderbolt Missile per volley. Uses TBOLT20, TBOLTM15, TBOLTM10, TBOLTM5 Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: The Thunderstorm is an experiment in using Thunderbolt missiles as artillery. It's unique rack system loads and launches a full ton of any size Thunderbolt Missile per volley. Uses TBOLT20, TBOLTM15, TBOLTM10, TBOLTM5 Ammo.
content.content: 雷霆风暴是使用霹雳火导弹作为火炮的一次实验.它独特的支架系统可以在每次齐射时装填并发射任何尺寸的全重量霹雳火导弹. 可以使用TBOLT20,TBOLTM15,TBOLTM10,TBOLTM5弹药.
